name: Germaphobe (Fava Beans)
description:
This is a very quick game I made for the 152nd Trijam which you can find here: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-152

The theme is "Leave me Alone" so I thought of making a wave shooter. You play as a suited-up germaphobe blasting germs.

The goal of the Trijam is to make a game in 3 hours so I wanted to see what I could do with Gdevelop in that amount of time. It turns out that I can make a fairly simple wave shooter in that timeframe at a leisurely pace. This is due to the fact that I used third-party assets for art and sounds so that I could focus on the game making. And Gdevelop is good for turning out basic games quickly.

Credits

For art, I used a few of Kenney's assets:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Music and sound effects came from here:

https://mixkit.co/
